definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: The cowboy caught the runaway horse with a rope.
sentences.chinese: 那個牛仔用套索套住了那匹失控的脫繮野馬。

sentences.english: The only thing missing is a noose.
Now I must prepare the nooses and the rope to lash him alongside, he thought.
sentences.chinese: 現在我得準備好套索和繩子，把它綁在船邊，他想。

sentences.english: Use the Polygonal Lasso Tool to select and delete it.
sentences.chinese: 使用多邊形套索工具選擇並刪除舊腦袋。

sentences.english: This lariat style necklace is adjustable from 15 to 18 inches.
sentences.chinese: 這套索風格項鍊是可調的，由15至18英寸。

sentences.english: He was roping a wild horse.
sentences.chinese: 他正在用套索套一匹野馬。

sentences.english: Use your Lasso to draw a rough selection around your image.
sentences.chinese: 使用套索在你的圖像周圍畫一個粗略的選區。

sentences.english: Since the Jena case, there have been several other noose incidents across the country.
sentences.chinese: 自耶拿事件以來，全美已發生了另外幾起套索事件。

sentences.english: Mark out the mask along its contour with Polygonal Lasso Tool.
sentences.chinese: 使用多邊形套索工具將面膜部分摳出來吧。

sentences.english: The Lasso Tool should not be used when using a laptop to file pictures.
sentences.chinese: 套索工具在使用筆記本電腦來編髮圖片時不允許使用。

sentences.english: The criminal would then be removed from the noose and laid on a table.
sentences.chinese: 此時，罪犯被從套索上搬下來，放在一張桌子上。

sentences.english: You and your fiancee face the hangman 's noose.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的未婚妻將面臨劊子手的套索。

sentences.english: On the roof of the RMI house are these two Solatubes.
sentences.chinese: 落山基研究房屋的房頂上是兩套索樂圖產品。

definition: a wizard's wand (notion borrowed from Western fantasy fiction)
iron hook at the end a long pole
pitchfork/garden fork/restraining pole (used by police)/military fork (of ancient times)
to hook onto/to hitch onto/to catch onto
